content: Bitcoin Farm (BTCFARM)Initial supply: 21,000,000,000,000Contract: 0x62cc01f9bbCf0B60d4EbcfDe456e95cD5ebF9495Bitcoin Farm (BTCFARM) is a BEP20 deflationary token supply designed to store value in the cryptocurrency market by burning tokens with every purchase and sale.Bitcoin Farm is a decentralized financial payments network that rebuilds the traditional payments stack on the Binance Smart Chain blockchain.BTCFARM is designed to be the simplest Token possible, with token buy and sell fees, Buy Tax: 5%, Sell Tax: 3%, Burn 3.7%, a decentralized version of conventional financial opportunities.Tokenomics: https://btcbr.info/coin/bitcoinfarm/Discord: https://discord.gg/5vAmbpCeNdBuy on Website: https://btcbr.info/btcfarm.phpCoinBrain: https://coinbrain.com/coins/0x62cc01f9bbCf0B60d4EbcfDe456e95cD5ebF9495Arken: https://swap.arken.finance/tokens/bsc/0x62cc01f9bbCf0B60d4EbcfDe456e95cD5ebF9495DexGuru: https://dex.guru/token/0x62cc01f9bbCf0B60d4EbcfDe456e95cD5ebF9495-bscCharts: https://charts.bogged.finance/?c=bsc&t=0x62cc01f9bbCf0B60d4EbcfDe456e95cD5ebF9495Poocoin: https://poocoin.app/tokens/0x62cc01f9bbCf0B60d4EbcfDe456e95cD5ebF9495Dexscreener: https://dexscreener.com/bsc/0x3D31c537f9913dff0D5129d6c4AF82DD924F57A4PancakeSwap: https://pancakeswap.finance/swap?outputCurrency=0x62cc01f9bbCf0B60d4EbcfDe456e95cD5ebF9495Add Liquidify: https://pancakeswap.finance/add/BNB/0x62cc01f9bbCf0B60d4EbcfDe456e95cD5ebF9495Swap $BTCBR to $BTCFARM https://pancakeswap.finance/swap?inputCurrency=0x0cf8e180350253271f4b917ccfb0accc4862f262&outputCurrency=0x62cc01f9bbCf0B60d4EbcfDe456e95cD5ebF9495Explorer: https://bscscan.com/token/0x62cc01f9bbCf0B60d4EbcfDe456e95cD5ebF9495More Info: https://btcbr.info/bitcoinfarm/Please, vote for $BTCFARM https://cryptovotelist.com/coin/bitcoin-farmHelp us get trending on CVL!
